categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: Intergalactic Association of Amalgamated Droid Builders

The Intergalactic Association of Amalgamated Droid Builders was a commerce guild comprised of droid technicians that existed during the Clone Wars. Aligned with the Confederacy of Independent Systems, it provided construction and service for the battle droids of the Separatist Army. To this end, it commissioned Cosweg Budeesho to design a propaganda poster designed to recruit young technicians to their cause.
